resources.string: Open openAi.com site Browser in app
You Api Key not correct. Check You Api key. (top right three dots -> settings -> API key)
No Internet connection pleeeeeeease turn on intertnet.
This is professional settings. You dont need to do that, this happends automatically.
Don\'t spam these buttons! It can damage or break something.
Visit the Openair website -> Learn about GPT-4 -> Try on ChatGPT Plus -> Register or log in.
After that, go to the website to get the key. -> -> Create new secret key write its name (whatever) -> Create new secret key -> copy, paste in the field above.
Open platform.openai.com/account/api-keys site Browser in app
This is a project from Github. Repository of this project is free
You Api Key empty. Check You Api key. (top right three dots -> settings -> API key)
An error has occurred in the application, should I report it?
Most capable GPT-3.5 model and optimized for chat at 1/10th the cost of text-davinci-003. Will be updated with our latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
Same capabilities as the standard gpt-3.5-turbo model but with 4 times the context.
Snapshot of gpt-3.5-turbo from June 13th 2023 with function calling data. Unlike gpt-3.5-turbo, this model will not receive updates, and will be deprecated 3 months after a new version is released.
